speaker: A
text: You have to get a permit from the police station in your local area to do that.

text: I think, you know, one of the things that, that, that needs to happen is, uh, to, to stop the impulse buyer from, uh, buying it quickly and, and, uh, maybe putting a week's waiting period or something on it.

speaker: A
text: But if someone's really determined to, to pick up a firearm you can pick it up any place.

text: I, I had a waiting period on my pistol because I was down in, uh, Tennessee. And, uh, they had a waiting period

speaker: A

text: and, and   and that's really what happened to the steel industry in this country.

text: So many times, I mean, you had the, uh, the coal miners and steel workers going out at the same time.

text: And, well, that took care of that industry

text: well, back to the original subject,

text: I think youngsters ought to go out and do some public service,
